com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy

Class PolicyFinderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.PolicyFinderFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StdPolicyFinderFactory

    public abstract class PolicyFinderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    PolicyFinderFactory provides methods for loading XACML 3.0 policies and policy sets that are used by the com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.PDPEngine to evaluate requests.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    car
